faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for all products in original condition. Returns are free for defective items.

faqs.question: How long is shipping?
faqs.answer: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days within the US. Express shipping (1-2 days) is available at checkout.

faqs.question: Do you ship internationally?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping typically takes 7-14 business days.

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer: You'll receive a tracking number via email once your order ships. You can also track orders in your account dashboard.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, PayPal, and Apple Pay. All transactions are secure and encrypted.

faqs.question: How do I contact customer service?
faqs.answer: You can reach our customer service team via email at support@example.com or by phone at 1-800-123-4567, Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM EST.

faqs.question: Do you offer gift wrapping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer gift wrapping for $5 per item. You can select this option during checkout and include a personalized message.

faqs.question: What is your warranty policy?
faqs.answer: All products come with a 1-year warranty against manufacturing defects. Extended warranty options are available for purchase.

faqs.question: Do you have a size guide?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can find our detailed size guide on each product page. We recommend measuring yourself before ordering.

faqs.question: Can I modify or cancel my order?
faqs.answer: Orders can be modified or cancelled within 1 hour of placement. Contact customer service for assistance.

faqs.question: Do you offer bulk discounts?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer discounts for bulk orders of 10 or more items. Contact our sales team for a custom quote.

faqs.question: What is your privacy policy?
faqs.answer: We never share your personal information with third parties. View our complete privacy policy on our website.

faqs.question: Do you have physical stores?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have stores in major cities across the US. Use our store locator on the website to find the nearest location.

faqs.question: How do I create an account?
faqs.answer: Click the 'Sign Up' button in the top right corner of our website. You'll need an email address and password.

faqs.question: Do you offer student discounts?
faqs.answer: Yes, students get 10% off with verified .edu email addresses. Sign up through our student verification system.
